Package gui.TempFiles

Class TempFileManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.TempFiles.TempFileManager
  • public class TempFileManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages the paths of the current files in the temp folder.

      • clearTempFolder

        public void clearTempFolder​(java.lang.String FolderPath)
        Deletes the contents of a folder. SHOULD NEVER BE ANYTHING but the temp folder if called. You have been warned!!!
        Parameters:
        FolderPath - string literal

      • clearTempFolder

        public void clearTempFolder()
        Deletes the contents of a folder. SHOULD NEVER BE ANYTHING but the temp folder if called. Uses the directoryPath set in the constructor You have been warned!!!

      • deleteCurrent

        private void deleteCurrent​(int index)
        Deletes the current file from tempFiles and temp folder and move current foreword.
